name: LoLTimerMac
short_description:
Hello Summoner,

are you a jungler that need a little help to get better? LoLTimerMac gives you the ability to time jungle respawns like blue/red buff, baron etc. so you and your teammates will always be there on time.

Attention!
The app will not work properly unless you enable access for assistive devices:

On OS-X 10.7 and 10.8:
go to Preferences->Accessibility and check the box next to “enable access for assistive devices”

On 10.9:
- Go to System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Accessibility
- Click the lock then check the box next to LoLTimerMac

Requires OSX 10.7+

Access the source here: http://github.com/ifeherva/LoLTimerMac
summary: Jungle timer for the Mac version of League of Legends
